definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be weary, impatient (cf. Ar. la0’a be slow, hesitating (Frey); mal0’anun after difficulty, la0aka: with difficulty (Lane:3007); Aram. [[לְאִי]], ba9oda la0’yin, la0’yan0);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּלְאֶה]] Job 4:2; [[וַתֵָּלֶא]] Job 4:5; 3 pl. [[וַיִּלְאוּ]] Ge 19:11; —be weary (in vain endeavour) sq. Inf. Ge 19:11; be weary, impatient at attempted consolation abs. Job 4:2; at calamity abs. Job 4:5 (‖[[בָּהַל]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִלְאָה]] Pr 26:15 + 2 t.; 2 fs. [[נִלְאֵית]] Is 47:13; [[נִלְאֵיתִי]] Is 1:14 + 3 t., etc.;—sq. inf. be weary of doing a thing, Ex 7:18 (JE), make oneself weary in doing something Pr 26:15 (of sluggard's laziness), weary (i.e. strenuously exert) oneself to Je 9:4, Je 20:9; abs. of eager and hopeless prayer [[על־הַבָּמָה]] ´[[נִל]] Moab, Is 16:12 (‖[[נִרְאָה]], [[בָּא אֶל־מִקְדָּשׁוֹ לְהִתְפַּלֵּל]]); of vain consultations, (sq. [[בְּ]]) Babylon Is 47:13; subj. ´[[י]], sq. inf. Is 1:14; Je 6:11, Je 15:6, always of exhausted patience; fig. of parched soil (abs.) Ps 68:10.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[הֶלְאָנִי]] Job 16:7; 3 fs. [[הֶלְאָת]] Ez Eze 24:12 (del. LXX Co), 1 s. sf. [[הֶלְאֵתִיְ]] Mic 6:3; Impf. [[וַיַּלְאוְּ]] Je 12:5; [[תַּלְאוּ]] Is 7:13; Inf.cstr. [[הַלְאוֹת]] Is 7:13; —weary, make weary, exhaust, sq. acc. Job 16:7 (subj. God); exhaust patience of, obj. God Is 7:13; obj. men Is 7:13, Je 12:5, Mic 6:3.
